mapper.sql: id, company_name, major_type, certificate, main_field, is_authentication, operator_name, reject_reason, company_type, company_email, company_short_name, company_fax, server_type, province, city, legal_representative, company_phone, company_address, status, group_index, index_show, business_license_number, organization_code_number, micro_url, micro_template, group_id, company_comment
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,c.file_path from maoding_web_company a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_relation b on a.id = b.org_pid left join maoding_web_company_attach c on a.id = c.company_id and c.file_type = '4' where a.status='0' and b.org_id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT a.id, a.company_name, a.company_short_name,a.province,a.city,c.org_type as company_type,server_type, IF(d.file_path is not null,CONCAT(d.file_group,'/',d.file_path ),null) as file_path, e.nick_name as alias_name from maoding_web_company a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_relation b on a.id = b.org_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_org c on b.id=c.id left join maoding_web_company_attach d on a.id = d.company_id and d.file_type = '4' LEFT JOIN maoding_web_business_partner e on a.id = e.company_id and e.type = 3 where a.status='0' and b.org_pid=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by c.org_type,c.create_date

SELECT a.id,a.company_name,a.company_short_name,a.province,a.city,server_type, IF(d.file_path is not null,CONCAT(d.file_group,'/',d.file_path ),null) as file_path from maoding_web_company a left join maoding_web_company_attach d on a.id = d.company_id and d.file_type = '4' where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
